name: DungeonMag
description: For a school project- This game will be a 2D Top Down Perspective, Bullet Hell and Shoot em up. Underground castle like dungeon with hazards that go from lava and minecarts from previous caves that were nearby, You are a dwarf engineered that got to the dungeon because you heard of odd materials that were deep down in the dungeon, but it isn’t going to be easy to obtain them, -waves and waves of enemies are willing to give their “lives” to protect the precious materials, materials that you will use in order to create weapons and protect yourself and fall in an endless loop of creating and upgrading in order to survive.
